ctarron.lobby.intro1:
To those who shall answer the ancient call:
Choose the hue that binds your soul to the path ahead.
Step upon the platform, and let the journey ignite.
The path to the
ctarron.lobby.intro2:
opens only to those who possess them all.
The world holds its breath for you.
ctarron.lobby.credit:
Map by Ctarron
Music by Kortizas
ctarron.acid.lore2: Release to shoot a toxic projectile.
ctarron.acid.lore3: Can also be used to dissolve exposed copper and extinguish fires.
ctarron.fire.lore3: Can also be used to propel yourself through the air and ignite fires.
ctarron.bullet.lore1: Right-click to shoot a projectile up to 45 blocks.
ctarron.bullet.lore2: If it hits a mob, the spell will recharge instantly.
